text:

Full reload required to solve.
author: Daniele
title: AW139@3 Stuck in reposition

text: customer called due to , sim stuck in reposition , reoladed all simulation , solved
author: Leonardo
title: A169 stuck in reposition

text: during reloading simulation , found interface "usb_2" abnormally loaded , rebooted cppdms one time, solved

title: A109  MR

text: during mr found ownship crash ,restarted process to solve
author: Leonardo
title: A109 ownship

text:
Paint touch up done on Pilot Cyclic, Copilot Cyclic and Collective.
Most of the avionic panels have been painted.
author: Daniele
title: AW139#3 Paint touch up

text:
Tested all the avionics panel and fixed the following:
LT panel - 9x NVG filter replaced + 2x backlights replaced + 1x backlight fixed (welding detached).
RCP panel - 8x NVG filters replaced + 5x backlights replaced.
Fire panel - 1x backlight replaced.
LDG LTS panel - 2x backlights replaced.
SX5 panel - 2x backlights replaced.
Floats panel - 2x backlights replaced.
LT panel - 7x NVG filters replaced + 2x backlights replaced.
MFD/PFD selection panel - 2x backlights replaced.
author: Daniele
title: AW139#3 Panels backlights fixing

text: AW HOST has been rebooted before performing the MR due to issues in the last few days with the AFCS
author: Daniele
title: A139#3 AW HOST rebooted

text:
Performed Visual PM:
UV dots fixed on TCL and BFR.
Geometry touch up not required after the UV dots fixing.
Brightness was good, FS40 file updated, put on our repository.
Colors were perfect.
author: Daniele
title: Performed Visual PM

text:
Performed cleaning PM.
Someone lost part of the swiffer attachment, couldn't find it anyywhere.
Someone (for the third times in 3 weeks) lost all the vacuum cleaner attachment.
It takes months to me to find all the attachment all around the company and now they're lost again.
Now we have to vacuum the floor with the nozzle instead the brush.
Roll of paper is missing as well.
AGAIN.
author: Daniele
title: AW139#3 Performed Cleaning PM
